cocktails.instructions: Blend all the ingredients with ice in an electric blender, pour into a large goblet or Hurricane glass and serve.
cocktails.name: piña colada

cocktails.instructions: Stir, strain, rocks glass, express peel and discard.
cocktails.name: cigarettes and chocolate milk

cocktails.instructions: Add 1 cup crushed ice to a blender and add the remaining ingredients. Blend for 5 seconds, then pour unstrained into a frozen pineapple. Garnish with pineapple fronds.
cocktails.name: hawaiian coffee colada

ingredients: 3 oz Hot chocolate (1 3.1 oz disk Mexican hot chocolate)
cocktails.instructions: Bring the milk, chocolate, and cinnamon stick to a boil and then reduce to a simmer for 20 minutes until frothy and dissolved. Add tequila, Frangelico, and a pinch of chili powder to a coffee mug and top with hot chocolate mixture. Garnish with a pinch of cinnamon and a bit more chili or chipotle powder.
cocktails.name: spiced hot chocolate

ingredients: 1 oz Jamaican rum, Appleton Estate V/X
3/4 oz Coconut cream (3 parts Coco Lopez : 1 part coconut milk)
cocktails.instructions: Shake, strain, hurricane or Collins glass, top with crushed ice, mint sprig, and orange slice.
cocktails.name: brancolada

cocktails.instructions: Blend all with 4 ice cubes. Pour in glass. I 've strained the mix before serving.And served it on rocks.
cocktails.name: peanut colada

ingredients: 2 oz Stout, Left Hand Milk Stout
3/4 oz Coconut cream (3 parts Coco Lopez : 1 part coconut milk)
cocktails.instructions: Shake, strain over one long ice shard in a Collins, garnish with slapped mint sprig, serve with straw.
cocktails.name: piña colada (beer)

cocktails.instructions: Shake, strain over Champagne and ice, garnish.
cocktails.name: la cola nostra

ingredients: 1/2 oz Martinique Rum, Rhum JM Blanc
1 oz Coconut syrup (3 parts coconut cream : 1 part coconut milk)
cocktails.instructions: Shake, strain over crushed ice in a Collins or hurricane glass, garnish with slapped mint.
cocktails.name: absinthe colada

cocktails.instructions: Dry shake all ingredients, pour into a mug/glass two-thirds filled with crushed ice.  Top with more crushed ice, add straw and garnish with fresh grated nutmeg.
cocktails.name: cafe colada
